detaileddescription.para: iccPngDump is a cross platform command line tool for extracting and analyzing ICC color profiles embedded in PNG images. It reads metadata from PNG files and, if present, extracts and optionally saves the ICC profile.

sect1.title: ðŸ”§ Features

listitem.para: Color type (e.g., RGB, Grayscale, Palette, RGBA)

sect1.para:
âœ… ICC Extraction:
Parses and displays detailed PNG metadata
Extracts embedded ICC profiles from PNG images
Outputs ICC profile information including color space, PCS, and version
Optionally saves ICC profile data to a separate file

âœ… ICC Injection:
Profile size
Color Space
Colorimetric PCS
Profile version

ðŸ§ª Fuzzing Support:
Ideal for image fuzzers and ICC validation pipelines

sect2.title: ðŸ“¤ Extract ICC Profile
sect2.para: Saves the embedded ICC profile (if any) into output.icc.

sect2.title: ðŸ“¥ Inject ICC Profile
sect2.para: Injects profile.icc into the PNG and creates output.png.
